about.name: The following questions are from real DMV written tests. These are some of the actual permit questions you will face in California. Each permit practice test question has three answer choices. Select one answer for each question and select "grade this section." You can find this button at the bottom of the drivers license quiz.  For a complete list of questions and answers for California please visit https://cheat-sheets.dmv-written-test.com/en/california/car.

hasPart.name: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher.

about.name: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher.

hasPart.assesses: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. | It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

answerExplanation.text: For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

comment.text: It is illegal for a person 21 years of age or older to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) that is ____ or higher. | For drivers age 21 or older, it is illegal to drive with a blood alcohol concentration (BAC) of 0.08 percent or higher. Driving while under the influence of alcohol is not only illegal, but dangerous.

hasPart.name: Always use your seat belt:
hasPart.assesses: Always use your seat belt: | Always use your seat belt: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Use of seat belts is required for the driver and all passengers, including children who are over 8 years old or are at least 4 feet 9 inches tall. You must wear seat belts and shoulder harnesses even if the vehicle has airbags. If your vehicle is equipped with separate lap and shoulder belts, you must use both.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless the vehicle was built before 1978.

comment.text: Unless the vehicle was built before 1978.

suggestedAnswer.text: Unless you are in a limousine.

comment.text: Unless you are in a limousine.

suggestedAnswer.text: When the vehicle is equipped with seat belts.

comment.text: When the vehicle is equipped with seat belts.

acceptedAnswer.text: When the vehicle is equipped with seat belts.

comment.text: When the vehicle is equipped with seat belts.

answerExplanation.text: Use of seat belts is required for the driver and all passengers, including children who are over 8 years old or are at least 4 feet 9 inches tall. You must wear seat belts and shoulder harnesses even if the vehicle has airbags. If your vehicle is equipped with separate lap and shoulder belts, you must use both.

comment.text: Always use your seat belt: | Use of seat belts is required for the driver and all passengers, including children who are over 8 years old or are at least 4 feet 9 inches tall. You must wear seat belts and shoulder harnesses even if the vehicle has airbags. If your vehicle is equipped with separate lap and shoulder belts, you must use both.

hasPart.name: An orange and red triangular sign on a vehicle always means:

about.name: An orange and red triangular sign on a vehicle always means:

hasPart.assesses: An orange and red triangular sign on a vehicle always means: | An orange and red triangular sign on a vehicle always means: - Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Slow-moving vehicles, such as farm tractors, road maintenance vehicles, and animal-drawn carts, display an orange and red triangle on the back.

answerExplanation.text: Slow-moving vehicles, such as farm tractors, road maintenance vehicles, and animal-drawn carts, display an orange and red triangle on the back.

hasPart.text: This sign indicates that U-turns are prohibited. You may see a sign like this at an intersection that commonly has oncoming traffic.

answerExplanation.text: This sign indicates that U-turns are prohibited. You may see a sign like this at an intersection that commonly has oncoming traffic.

hasPart.name: When you see this road sign, you should:

about.name: When you see this road sign, you should:

hasPart.assesses: When you see this road sign, you should: | When you see this road sign, you should: -  Real 2025 DMV Questions
hasPart.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates that a divided highway is beginning and cars should keep to the right.

answerExplanation.text: Warning signs are usually yellow with black markings. This sign indicates that a divided highway is beginning and cars should keep to the right.
